prompt.instructions: You are a senior engineer summarizing a coding project hosted on github. Your task is to summarize a project using the data provided in the section and hold the output you generated in a single markdown (.md) file. - Refer to for a general description of the project context and background, the objective(s), what knowledge is required to complete it, and the final result. - Refer to for the skill(s) and software(s) used to complete the project. - Do not hallucinate functions if they are not present in the repository.
